reviewText: When I say a film is a waste of time and money, it must be true.  I LOVE obscure horror titles, and zombie movies are my favorites.  But this one is a waste, as I should've been able to tell from the title.  Don't watch this  one at all.  Forget what it's about.  Just steer clear of this one.
Title: N/A

reviewText: "The Granny" is one of the best B-movies that I have ever seen. It has all the gore, cheese, and cheap thrills of the best movies in its genre. I don't see how anyone could watch this movie and not smile. You aren't going to be scared by this horror flick, but you will enjoy the comedy of it all. Granny makes a great villain and reminds me of the Freddy Krueger we know and love from the later sequels. She has lots of great one liners. Granny's awful family members also shine with excellent comedic performances. Is the acting going to win an Oscar? No way! However, the actors seem to be keenly aware of what kind of movie they are making and fully embrace it. I have seen this movie like 20 times in my life and I've had fun every time.It's time for this forgotten gem to make it onto DVD and/or blu-ray. If "Psycho Cop" and "Girlfriend from Hell" can make it to DVD, I don't see why this one can't. I'd even be fine with a cheapo bare bones DVD release with no special features. Someone needs to save this movie from obscurity.
summary: This movie needs a DVD release ASAP!

reviewText: This film has been out of print for sometime and who knows, if ever, it will appear on DVD. This video has caused fierce bidding wars on eBay.Shannon Whirry is the goody-two-shoes who cares for her ailing (and insane) grandmother. The rest of the family hates Granny and teases Shannon for giving her so much care. Unfortunatly Shannon gets nothing in the will and the family make out like bandits.However Granny received a visit form a salesman promising eternal life. So.....Granny becomes Monster Granny and runs amok in the mansion, slaughtering her family.To say this film is gross and in bad taste is an understatement. Imagine if you will a lovely brunnette niece (a Swedish Bikini Team Model to boot) is giving oral pleasure to her freshly decapitated uncle. Yes folks that and more.Shannon steals the show as she is the hottest B-actress since Shannon Tweed.
summary: 5 Star movies should never be out of stock

reviewText: I thought the Simpsons and the Griphens on Family Guy were a disfuctional family. Horror has a new name GRANNY. The plot is simple but efficient. The actors are good (two thumbs up for "Michelle" and the killer) and the dialogs are even quite clever. from the beginning to the end, the action will leave you breathless, you just can't escape it... There is blood, awful murders, funny moments, and a sense of perversity that goes far beyond any rule. This granny had some messenger guy come buy and deliver some stuff that is suppost to give her eternal life. Her own children wanted her dead by poisned her food, when she dies they can take her money cause she's rich.
summary: What a scary silly horror film

reviewText: Well, I actually own a bootleg DVD of this, it has a cool custom DVD cover and everything, with great picture quality. But of course, that is not listed on Amazon.com, so I had to put my review on the VHS, but the same movie.Well, this movie opens with a really odd scene, set back in probably the 16th Century. We see some girl with a devil face, drooling blood, with her father trying to preform an exorcism on her, while the mother nervously watches from a far. Then a man in a cape walks in. Apparently, the girl took this potion to give her eternal life, but did not follow the rules of taking care fo it, resulting in her possessed self, the fathers head eventually gets crushed, with the devil girl melting in the sunlight. The opening credits start rolling with an old english font with crazy music in the backround.Now we go to the main plot of the film, Shannon Whirry and freaking Stella Stevens. Stevens voice is so rattled in this movie,it almost begs the question what an actress like HER got paid for this! It is around Thanksgiving time, so their dickish family soon shows up for the week or weekend or whatever. We have Heather Elizabeth Parkhurst from Bikini Summer 3. Brant Hoffman from Gaurding Tess & Police Academy. Sandy Helberg from Spaceballs. Lastly Ryan Bollman from Children of the Corn II. They all attempt to kill Stella Stevens character to inherit all her money. But her two grand-daughters Shannon Whirry, and "Samantha Hendricks" are the only two not wanting in on their evil scheme. But the same man from the beginning comes by to give Stella Stevens the potion for eternal life, which was mistakenly took in the opening. But, one rule is already broken when it is unknowingly placed in the sun, starts to turn red and smoke. Stevens' cat soon licks the bottle, turning it into a werewolf type creature.At dinner, the attempt to kill her with poison fail due to Hendricks spoiling the families scheme. She is then eventually finally put to sleep by drinking the contaminated elixour. Much to Shannon Whirry's horror. But, Granny suddenly comes to life in the morgue, killing the two hillbillies that work there, soon on her way to kill her family. She eventually does so, whether slicing up there face, making fur coats eat them, chopping pinkies off, and even wrestling them to death.The man who gives out the eternal life elixour returns in attempts to stop the granny, but now the granny resurrects all her family members as the worst zombies I've ever seen in film, making headless bodies walking around bumping into tables. Eventually, the house is filled with sunlight, exploding granny and all of her zombie family members. Even though the elixour guy got a sword stuck up his ass, he returns as a cop ni the very end, proving he is the only one knowing how to correctly take this elixour. But as it is revealed, we see that both Shannon Whirry & Samantha Hendricks may be possessed under grannies powers, then the film ends, with heavy metal music playing through the credits, no comment.This is literally one of the worst movies I've ever seen, so cheesy, so much bad acting, retarded zombies...........BUT ITS SO BAD ITS SO GOOD, I GIVE IT 5/5!!!!
